description: Maryland administers the Federal Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program to support the development of affordable multifamily rental housing. Credits are awarded competitively in conjunction with the State's Rental Housing Program funds and federal HOME funds to fourteen recipients in 2014. Tax credits are allocated in accordance with federal IRS rules and Maryland's Qualified Allocation Plan.

metadata.attribution: Maryland Department of Housing and Community Development

name: Approved Low Income Housing Tax Credit Recipients 2014 April 2014
